A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unlike other star wars films\, the last jedi does something different and that leaving the audience not knowing if a character will make it\, the scope and depth of this film is simply amazing. My only concern with the film is as a star wars fan it does not fill the wants i had for the film but replaces it with something i did not think i wanted but enjoyed receiving\, the film has some amazing comedy\, action scenes and answered a lot of questions but at the same time gave me more questions to be answered and at times felt like a filler for this new trilogy but a really well made filler. i look forward for the final film in this trilogy.
